name: Fake DNS Service
author: ddz <ddz@theta44.org>
hdm <x@hdm.io>
fozavci
description:
This module provides a DNS service that redirects
      all queries to a particular address.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SRVHOST
options.description: The local host to listen on.

options.name: SRVPORT
options.description: The local port to listen on.

options.name: TARGETHOST
options.description: The address that all names should resolve to

options.name: TARGETDOMAIN
options.description: The list of target domain names we want to fully resolve (BYPASS) or fake resolve (FAKE). Use '*' for wildcard.

options.name: RR_SRV_PORT
options.description: The port field in the SRV response when FAKE

options.name: LogConsole
options.description: Determines whether to log all request to the console

options.name: LogDatabase
options.description: Determines whether to log all request to the database
